label: Settings
info:
This flow displays output from the PID 
algorithm. This can be useful for tuning 
purposes.

name: Cascade PID
Cascade PID - integrator max calculation
Basic On-Off
Database log entry
func:
msg.payload = [{
        measurement: global.get("batch"),
        fields: {
            "Charge Temp": global.get("charge.temp"),
            "Jacket Temp": global.get("jacket.temp"),
            "Pot Vapor Temp": global.get("pot_vapor.temp"),
            "Dephleg Temp": global.get("dephleg.temp"),
            "Head Vapor Temp": global.get("head_vapor.temp"),
            "Dephleg Target": global.get("dephleg.target"),
            "Charge ABV": global.get("charge.ABV"),
            "Pot Vapor ABV": global.get("pot_vapor.ABV"),
            "Product ABV": global.get("head_vapor.ABV")
            },
        timestamp: new Date()
}]
return msg

name: 30 sec RC + 20
10 sec RC
2 msg transport delay
